subSections.title: Glyph origin
Etymology
subSections.text:
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*tsa ~ za||child, offspring, relatives; to come forth (as child at birth); to love; loving}}.

Cognate with {{och-l|字|character; letter}}, {{och-l|慈|loving; kind}}, {{och-l|滋|to grow, to breed, to propagate, to bring about, to increase}}, {{och-l|孳|to breed, to propagate}}.
